title: FPS Issues
body:
I needed help with some FPS problems I have been having recently.

I have a Pavilion 23 All-in-One computer, and the overall graphics are nice and the performance on other games are standard and have no issues. However, on League, I experience FPS drops from around 70 to ~25 when minions spawn.

The problem does not begin just when minions spawn, but it also continues to grow; my fps continues to drop from 60->50->35->25 throughout the game. I have had no idea what exactly is causing the problem besides the spawning and increasing number of minions on the map, and have been doing research, but I have not found any relevant posts that have helped solve my problem.

Please leave any recommendations down below; I play on "very low" for all my settings, shadows off, and all the graphically intense boxes unchecked, and I have reset my drivers multiple times.

replies.body:
There could be a few different factors causing your FPS issues at the moment. The biggest culprits for these sorts of issues are usually a bad display driver or bad windows power settings. Working through [**framerate troubleshooting guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) should help in resolving this, as it covers the most common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
